data.name: AllowRegistration.HelpText
data.value: Ngabe ufuna izivakashi ezingaziwa zikwazi ukubhalisela i-akhawunti kusayithi

data.name: ProfileUrl.HelpText
data.value: Ngokuzikhethela unikeze i-url yephrofayili yomsebenzisi eqokiwe

data.name: LockoutDuration.HelpText
data.value: Inombolo yemizuzu umsebenzisi okufanele akhishwe ngaphandle

data.name: MaximumFailures.HelpText
data.value: Inani eliphakeme lemizamo yokungena ngemvume ngaphambi kokuthi umsebenzisi akhiyiwe ngaphandle

data.name: RequireDigit.HelpText
data.value: Khomba ukuthi amagama okungena kumele aqukathe idijithi

data.name: RequireLower.HelpText
data.value: Khomba uma amagama okungena kumele aqukathe uhlamvu oluncane

data.name: RequirePunctuation.HelpText
data.value: Khombisa ukuthi amaphasiwedi kumele aqukethe uhlamvu olungelona i-alphanumeric (isib. izimpawu zezimpawu)

data.name: RequireUpper.HelpText
data.value: Khomba uma amagama okungena kumele aqukathe uhlamvu olukhulu

data.name: Success.UpdateConfig.Restart
data.value: Ukumiswa kubuyekeziwe. Uyacelwa ukuba ukhethe ukuqala kabusha uhlelo lokusebenza ukuze lezi zinguquko zisebenze.

data.name: UniqueCharacters.HelpText
data.value: Inani elincane lezinhlamvu eziyingqayizivele okumele ligama lokungena liqukethe

data.name: AllowSiteLogin.HelpText
data.value: Uyafuna ukuvumela abasebenzisi ukuthi bangene besebenzisa igama lomsebenzisi negama lokungena eliphethwe endaweni yasendaweni kule ndawo? Qaphela ukuthi kufanele ukhubaze le nketho kuphela uma usuvele ulungiselele ngempumelelo umhlinzeki wokungena ngemvume wangaphandle, ngaphandle kwalokho ungazikhiya ngaphandle kwesayithi.

data.name: Authority.HelpText
data.value: I-url yegunya noma i-URL yomkhiqizi ehlobene nomnikezeli

data.name: CreateUsers.HelpText
data.value: Ngabe ufuna ukuthi abasebenzisi abasha badalwe ngokuzenzakalelayo? Uma ukhubaza le nketho, abasebenzisi kufanele bavele babhaliswe kusayithi ukuze bangene ngemvume ngemvume yabo yangaphandle.

data.name: DomainFilter.HelpText
data.value: Provide any email domain filter criteria (separated by commas). Domains to exclude should be prefixed with an exclamation point (!). For example 'microsoft.com,!hotmail.com' would include microsoft.com email addresses but not hotmail.com email addresses.

data.name: EmailClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify the type name of the email address claim provided by the identity provider. The typical value is 'email'.

data.name: MetadataUrl.HelpText
data.value: Isiphetho sokuthola ukuthola imethadatha yalesi sibonelelo sobunikazi. Cacisa kuphela uma umhlinzeki wesazisi engasebenzisi indlela ejwayelekile (isib. /.well-known/openid-configuration)

data.name: PKCE.HelpText
data.value: Khombisa ukuthi umhlinzeki we-identity usekela ukhiye wobufakazi bokushintshaniswa kwekhodi (PKCE)

data.name: ProviderName.HelpText
data.value: Cacisa igama elinobungane lomnikezeli womngenisi wangaphandle ozokhonjiswa ekhasini lokungena

data.name: RedirectUrl.HelpText
data.value: I-url yokuqondisa kabusha (noma i-url yokubuyisela emuva yokushayela) evame ukudinga ukubhaliswa nomhlinzeki kamazisi

data.name: Scopes.HelpText
data.value: Uhlu lwezinombolo zokucela kumhlinzeki wezazisi (ezihlukaniswe ngama-commas). Uma kungekho okucacisiwe, ama-Scopes ajwayelekile azosetshenziswa ngokuzenzakalelayo.

data.name: UserInfoUrl.HelpText
data.value: Isiphetho sokuthola ulwazi lomsebenzisi. Lokhu kufanele kube yi-API endpoint noma i-url yekhasi equkethe ikheli le-imeyili lomsebenzisi.

data.name: CookieName.HelpText
data.value: Ungakhetha ukusebenzisa igama lekhukhi lokuqinisekiswa ngokwezifiso kusayithi ngalinye. Kodwa-ke, sicela uqaphele ukuthi uma ufuna ukwabelana ngekhukhi lokuqinisekiswa phakathi kwamasayithi esizindeni esifanayo, kufanele basebenzise igama lekhukhi elihambisanayo. Qaphela futhi ukuthi ukushintsha igama lekhukhi lokuqinisekiswa kuzokhipha bonke abasebenzisi bamanje.

data.name: Lifetime.HelpText
data.value: Inani lemizuzu lapho ithokheni kufanele lisebenze khona

data.name: Secret.HelpText
data.value: Uma ufuna ukunikeza ukufinyelela kwe-API, sicela ucacise imfihlo ezosetshenziselwa ukufihla ngamakhowudi amathokheni akho. Imfihlo kufanele ibe nezinhlamvu eziyi-16 noma ngaphezulu ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha okuhle. Sicela uqaphele ukuthi uma ushintsha le mfihlo, wonke amathokheni akhona azoba angavumelekile futhi kuzodingeka akhiqizwe kabusha.

data.name: Token.HelpText
data.value: Khetha inkinobho Yenza Ithokheni ukukhiqiza ithokheni yokufinyelela ehlala isikhathi eside (esebenzayo unyaka ongu-1). Qiniseka ukuthi ugcina le thokheni endaweni ephephile ngoba ngeke ukwazi ukuyifinyelela esikhathini esizayo.

data.name: TwoFactor.HelpText
data.value: Ngabe ufuna abasebenzisi basebenzise ukuqinisekiswa kwezici ezimbili? Qaphela ukuthi kufanele usebenzise inketho Ekhubazekile uze uqinisekise ngempumelelo ukuthi Umsebenzi Wesaziso Emisebenzini Ehleliwe uvunyelwe futhi izinketho zakho ze-SMTP kuzilungiselele noma kungenjalo uzozikhiya ngaphandle.

data.name: IdentifierClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Specify the type name of the unique user identifier claim provided by the identity provider. The default value is 'sub'.

data.name: Parameters.HelpText
data.value: Ngokuzikhethela ucacise noma yimaphi amapharamitha angeziwe njengamagama / amabhangqa amanani ukuthumela kumhlinzeki we-identity (ahlukaniswe ngama-commas uma kukhona amaningi).

data.name: RoleClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide the type name of the roles claim provided by the identity provider (the standard default is 'roles'). If role names from the identity provider do not exactly match your site role names, please use the Role Claim Mappings.

data.name: RoleClaimMappings.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a comma delimited list of role names provided by the identity provider, as well as mappings to your site roles. For example if the identity provider includes an 'Admin' role name and you want it to map to the 'Administrators' site role you should specify 'Admin:Administrators'.

data.name: SynchronizeRoles.HelpText
data.value: Lolu khetho luzokwengeza noma lususe izabelo zendima ukuze izindima zesayithi zihambisane ncamashi nezindima ezinikezwe ngumnikezeli womazisi womsebenzisi

data.name: ProfileClaimTypes.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a comma delimited list of user profile claim type names provided by the identity provider, as well as mappings to your user profile definition. For example if the identity provider includes a 'given_name' claim and you have a 'FirstName' user profile definition you should specify 'given_name:FirstName'.

data.name: AuthFlow.CodeIdTokenToken
data.value: Ikhodi Yokugunyaza + Ithokheni ye-ID + Ithokheni Yokufinyelela

data.name: AuthResponseType.HelpText
data.value: Cacisa uhlobo lwempendulo yesigunyazo. Okuzenzakalelayo yikhodi yokugunyaza ebhekwa njengenketho ephephe kakhulu ngokususelwa ekucacisweni kwakamuva kwe-OAuth.

data.name: VerifyUsers.HelpText
data.value: Ngabe ufuna abasebenzisi abakhona benze isinyathelo esengeziwe sokuqinisekisa i-imeyili ukuxhumanisa ukungena kwabo kwangaphandle? Uma ukhubaza lolu khetho, abasebenzisi abakhona bazoxhunyaniswa ngokuzenzakalelayo.

data.name: AlwaysRemember.HelpText
data.value: Ukunika amandla le nketho kuzosetha ikhukhi elihlala njalo ngokubambisana nesikhathi sokuphelelwa yisikhathi sekhukhi, esizongena ngokuzenzakalelayo abasebenzisi ngesikhathi esizayo lapho bevakashela isayithi. Ngokuzenzakalelayo, isayithi lizosebenzisa amakhukhi weseshini.

data.name: CookieExpiration.HelpText
data.value: You can choose to use a custom authentication cookie expiration timespan for each site (e.g. '08:00:00' for 8 hours). The default is 14 days if not specified.

data.name: ReviewClaims.HelpText
data.value: Lolu khetho luzoqopha uhlu oluphelele lwezicelo ezibuyiselwe ngumhlinzeki ku-log yomcimbi. Kufanele isetshenziselwe kuphela izinhloso zokuhlola. Umngenisi wangaphandle uzovinjelwa uma lolu khetho luvunyiwe.

data.name: NameClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify the type name of the user's name claim provided by the identity provider. The typical value is 'name'.

data.name: SaveTokens.HelpText
data.value: Cacisa ukuthi amathokheni okufinyelela nokuvuselela kabusha kufanele alondolozwe ngemuva kokungena ngempumelelo. Okuzenzakalelayo kungamanga ukunciphisa usayizi wekhukhi lokuqinisekisa.

data.name: LogoutEverywhere.HelpText
data.value: Ngabe ufuna abasebenzisi baphume kuzo zonke izinhlanganiso ezisebenzayo kunoma yisiphi isisetshenziswa, noma kuphela isiwombe sabo samanje?

data.name: AllowHostRole.HelpText
data.value: Khombisa ukuthi izindima zomgcini zisekelwa yini ngumnikezeli wezazisi. Sicela uqaphele ngalolu khetho njengoba luvumela umsebenzisi ophethe ukuthi aphathe wonke amasayithi ngaphakathi kokufakwa kwakho.
